    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Konkurrerande produkter</string>
            <string language="en">Competing products</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konkurrierende Produkte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Produits de concurrence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produtos competindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prodotti competenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανταγωνιστικά προϊόντα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Productos de competición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Ett företag har alltid konkurrenter. Vi måste se konkurrensen i ett vidare perspektiv än att endast omfatta produkter som liknar vår.Modul 2 - Marknad.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">A company has always competitors. We must see the competition in a wider perspectives than to only to cover products that compare spring.

Module 2 - market.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ekonomi</string>
            <string language="sv">produkt</string>
            <string language="sv">konkurrent</string>
            <string language="sv">företag</string>
            <string language="sv">kund</string>
            <string language="sv">kund</string>
            <string language="sv">behov</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="en">product</string>
            <string language="en">competitor</string>
            <string language="en">carry out</string>
            <string language="en">customer</string>
            <string language="en">customer</string>
            <string language="en">needs</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Firma hat immer Konkurrenten. Wir 
müssen die Konkurrenz in breitere Perspektiven als zu nur sehen, 
Produkte zu bedecken, die spring.Module 2 vergleichen - market.Is, das
in FöretagarSKOLAN eingeschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une compagnie a toujours des concurrents. 
Nous devons voir la concurrence dans des perspectives plus 
larges qu'à seulement pour couvrir les produits qui comparent 
spring.Module 2 - market.Is inclus dans FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma companhia tem sempre concorrentes. Nós
devemos ver a competição no uns perspectives mais largos do que a 
somente para cobrir os produtos que comparam spring.Module 2 - 
market.Is incluído em FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'azienda ha sempre competitori. Dobbiamo 
vedere la concorrenza in prospettive più larghe che a soltanto 
coprire i prodotti che confrontano spring.Module 2 - market.Is incluso
in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια επιχείρηση έχει πάντα τους ανταγωνιστές. 
Πρέπει να δούμε τον ανταγωνισμό ευρύτερες 
προοπτικές απ'ό,τι μόνο για να καλύψουμε τα προϊόντα που 
συγκρίνουν την ενότητα 2 άνοιξη - η αγορά συμπεριλαμβάνεται σε 
FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una compañía tiene siempre competidores. 
Debemos ver la competición en perspectivas más amplias que a 
solamente cubrir los productos que comparan spring.Module 2 - 
market.Is incluido en FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
